loans.use: to buy essential foods such as coffee, shortening, rice, sugar, flour, eggs, bread, soft drinks, etc.

loans.name: María Dolores

texts.es:
María de 45 años de edad, solo estudió hasta primer grado ya que su familia era de escasos recursos económicos, está casada y su esposo se dedica a la agricultura y tienen una hija que vive con ellos


María le ayuda a su esposo a la crianza y engorde de de gallinas y cerdos, luego de cuidarlos los venden a buen precio.


 El crédito lo necesita para comprar fertilizantes para aplicar a los cultivos de maíz, frijol y café.

Su mayor sueño es ver a su hija convertida en una persona profesional para que  tenga mejor condición de vida.
texts.en:
Maria, 45, only has a first grade education because of the scarce economic resources her family had. She is married and her husband works in agriculture; they have a daughter who lives at home.

Maria helps her husband raise and fatten the hens and pigs, then sells them at a good price.

She is in need of a loan to buy fertilizers to apply to her corn, bean and coffee crops.

Her greatest desire is to see her daughter become a professional and lead a better lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers to apply to her corn, bean and coffee crops.

loans.name: Darlis Patricia

texts.es:
Darlis, de 23 años de edad, está soltera, no tiene hijos y vive con su hermano porque sus padres ya fallecieron.

Darlis, tiene un pequeño cafetín en la escuela de la comunidad desde hace tres años, pero además de eso también se dedica a la crianza de cerdos, esta actividad la realiza junto a su hermano mayor.

Darlis, necesita el préstamo para comprar dos cerdos pequeños, porque la temporada escolar ya va terminar y tendrá que cerrar el cafetín durante dos meses y quiere aprovechar esas vacaciones para engordar los cerdos.

Ella sueña con ampliar su cafetín para aumentar sus ganancias y también sueña con tener una tienda en su casa.
texts.en:
Darlis, 23, is single and has no children. She lives with her brother because her parents are deceased.

Darlis runs a small coffee shop at the community school and has been in business for three years. But she also raises pigs together with her brother.

Darlis needs a loan to buy two piglets because the school term is almost over and she will have to close the coffee shop for two months. She wants to take advantage of the vacation to fatten the pigs.

She wants to expand the coffee shop and increase her earnings. She also dreams of opening a store in her home.

loans.use: to buy two piglets.

loans.name: Jose Benedicto

texts.es:
José, de 61 años de edad, está casado y tiene tres hijos, dos de ellos viven con él y uno ya es independiente y vive aparte con su esposa y sus dos hijos.

José, se dedica a la venta de muebles y electrodomésticos en los pueblos y cantones, los productos los vende al crédito y este negocio lo realiza desde hace 25 años y lo aprendió de su padre.

José, necesita el préstamo para comprar muebles y electrodomésticos al por mayor, para vender al detalle, con esto mejorara sus ganancias y crecerá su cartera de clientes.

José, sueña con tener su propia comercial y heredarles a sus hijos el negocio, para que tengan una fuente de ingresos fijos.
texts.en:
Jose, 61, is married and has three children. Two of them live at home and one is independent and lives with his wife and two children.

Jose sells furniture and domestic appliances in the villages and cantons. He sells the items on credit and has been in business for 25 years, having learned it from his father.

Jose needs a loan to buy furniture and domestic appliances wholesale to sell retail. This will improve his earnings and increase his customer base.

Jose dreams of having his own company to pass down to his children so they will have a fixed source of income.

loans.use: to buy furniture and domestic appliances wholesale.

loans.name: María Elena

texts.es:
María de 48 años de edad, tiene 4 hijos de los cuales dos viven con ella, y los otros dos tienen sus hogares aparte, logró estudiar hasta el sexto grado pues las circunstancias no le permitieron continuar.

María siempre se ha dedicado a los cultivos de maíz y frijol, actividad que aprendió desde muy pequeña cuando acompañaba a sus padres el campo.


El presente crédito le será de mucha ayuda a María para llevar a consultas médicas a un nieto que se encuentra mal de salud.

Ella espera seguir trabajando para poder superarse más en la vida.
texts.en:
María is 48 years old and has 4 children. Two of them are living with her and the other two are having their own household somewhere else.
She managed to attend school until the sixth grade, but then the circumstances did not allow her to continue.
María has always been cultivating corn and beans, which she learned since she was a little girl when she accompanied her parents to the field.

The present loan will help María a lot to bring a grandchild in bad health to medical consultations.
She hopes to go on working in order to further improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to bring a grandchild in bad health to medical consultations.

loans.name: Raquel Yudith

texts.es:
Raquel, de 53 años de edad, es una mujer muy trabajadora, no tuvo la oportunidad de asistir a la escuela, está casada y junto a su esposo tuvo dos hijas, su primer hija está acompañada y su segunda hija está estudiando la universidad y junto a su esposo trabajan duro cada día para poder apoyar a su hija para que salga adelante con sus estudios.
 
Raquel, toda su vida se ha dedicado a los oficios domésticos y a la agricultura junto a su esposo y es de la agricultura de donde han cubierto los gastos de la casa.

Raquel, necesita el préstamo para comprar fertilizantes para su cultivo, porque tiene cultivado 14,000 metros cuadrados de maíz y 7,000 metros cuadrados de frijol.

Raquel, sueña con ver a su hija graduada de la universidad y que sea una persona de bien para la sociedad.
texts.en:
53-year-old Raquel is a very busy woman. She didn´t have the opportunity to attend school. She´s married and together with her husband she had two daughters. Her first daughter is living in a relationship and her second daughter is studying at university. Together with her husband she´s working hard every day to be able to support their daughter with her studies.
Raquel has been doing domestic work and farming for her whole life together with her husband. And through farming they covered the household expenses. Raquel needs the loan to buy fertilizers for her crops, since she cultivates 14,000 square meters of corn and 7,000 square meters of beans.
Raquel dreams of seeing her daughter graduated at university and that she will be a good person for the society.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for her crops, since she cultivates 14,000 square meters of corn and 7,000 square meters of beans.

loans.name: Lidia Del Tránsito

texts.es:
Lidia de 64 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, está separada de su esposo, tiene 5 hijos 
de los cuales solo una hija tiene en casa y le ayuda en los oficios del hogar. 

Lidia atiende los oficios del hogar pero también es agricultora, ella cultiva maíz y frijol, esta actividad la hace desde pequeña porque sus padres le enseñaron, y hoy en día trabaja de 4 a 5 horas diarias.


Ella solicita este crédito para comprar una vaca lechera, que a largo plazo le generará ganancias. 

Ella sueña con seguir trabajando para apoyar a su hija y que logre sacar una carrera universitaria.
texts.en:
Lidia, who is 64 years old, had no opportunity to study and is separated from her husband. She has 5 children of which only one daughter lives at home and helps her with the household chores.

Lidia does the household chores but she is also a farmer who grows corn and beans. She has done this from an early age because her parents taught her and currently she works 4-5 hours a day. She is applying for a loan to buy a dairy cow which will generate long-term profits.

She dreams of continuing to work in order to support her daughter and help her to get a university degree.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Real Derby Group

texts.es:
Máximo, tiene 57 años de edad, él es socio del grupo "Real derby", formado por cinco socios. Es casado y tiene tres hijos adultos.
Maximo se dedica a la agricultura desde que tenía 18 años, se dedica a sembrar diversidad de verduras, los cuales luego de la cosecha son vendidos a los mercados mayoristas. Para realizar éste trabajo cuenta con un  pequeño terreno pero también alquila para poder sembrar mas.
Su mayor motivación son sus nietos ya que le gusta apoyarlos en lo que necesiten.
El préstamo recibido lo invertirá en la compra de semilla para sembrar cebolla, asi como también para pagar los operarios.
texts.en:
Máximo is 57 years old, he is a member of the Real Derby group, made up of five members. He is married and has three adult children.

Máximo has worked in agriculture since he was 18 years old, he works planting a variety of vegetables, which after the harvest are sold to the wholesale markets. To do this work, he has a small plot of land but he also rents to be able to plant more.

His greatest motivation are his grandchildren since he likes to support them in what they need.

The received loan will be invested in the purchase of seeds to plant onions and also to pay the workers.

loans.use: to invest in seeds and pay laborers to plant the onions.

loans.name: Kauchi

texts.en:
Kauchi is a married woman with six children, four of whom attend school. She owns a house that has neither electricity or piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for the family.

Kauchi operates a vegetable stall at the market, selling to town dwellers and neighbors. She faces the challenge of the high cost of transportation to where she works.

With the 10,000 Kenyan shillings (KES) loan, she wants to buy green vegetables, two crates of tomatoes and onions for her stall. She decided to join Yehu to access loans in order to boost her business.

loans.use: to buy green vegetables, tomatoes and onions for resale.

loans.name: Rosa Adelaida

texts.es:
Rosa, de 31 años de edad, toda su vida se ha dedicado a los oficios domésticos, no tuvo la oportunidad de asistir a la escuela; está acompañada y junto a su pareja tiene tres hijos, los cuales están estudiando.

Rosa, junto a su esposo se dedica a cultivar hortalizas como pepino, tomate y chile, porque tienen una casa maya, lo cual es de mucha utilidad para su cultivo y con la cual logran una mayor producción y una mayor ganancia.

Rosa, tiene cinco años de dedicarse a cultivar hortalizas junto a su esposo, ambos tiene mucha experiencia para manejar el cultivo.

Ella, necesita el préstamo para comprar insumos agrícolas para cultivar 3 tareas de chile, de donde espera tener mejores ganancias.

Rosa, sueña con tener otro invernadero y aumentar la producción y las ganancias; además desea apoyar a sus hijos en el estudio y que sean profesionales.
texts.en:
Rosa, 31 years old, has worked her entire life at the household tasks. She didn't have the opportunity to go to school. She is partnered and with her partner has three children, who are going to school.

Rosa, along with her partner, works growing vegetables such as cucumber, tomatoes, and chilies, because they have a mesh greenhouse, which is very helpful for their cultivation and with which they have achieved a larger production and greater earnings.

Rosa has been working growing vegetables with her partner for 5 years, they both have a lot of experience to take care of the crops.

Ella needs the loan to purchase agricultural supplies to cultivate 3 tareas of chilies, from which she expects to have more earnings.

Rosa dreams of having another greenhouse and increasing her production and her earnings, in addition she wants to support her children in their schooling so that they become professionals.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies to plant 3 tareas of chilies.

loans.name: Flor De La Cruz

texts.es:
Flor, de 39 años de edad, es una persona trabajadora, que desde pequeña se dedicó a los oficios domésticos, solamente pudo estudiar hasta quinto grado, está casada y tiene tres hijos, su esposo viajo a E.E.U.U, para cambiar la situación económica de su familia y los primeros tres años de estar allá le ayudo a su familia, luego se acompañó y dejó de ayudarle a su familia. 

Flor, tiene ocho años de dedicarse a la venta de pupusas, en donde ya tiene clientela y de esa manera se gana la vida diariamente. 


Flor, necesita el préstamo para comprar materia prima como chicharrones, aceite, harina, carne, entre otros para elaborar las pupusas.

Flor, desea seguir trabajando en la venta de pupusas y sueña con tener una tienda bien surtida en el futuro y ayudar a sus hijos para que estudien y se preparen académicamente.
texts.en:
Flor, 39 years old, is a hard-working person who, since she was little, has done the household tasks. She was only able to go to school up to the fifth grade, she is married and has three children. Her husband went to the US to improve the economic situation of the family and the first three years he was there, he helped his family, then he became partnered and stopped helping his family.

Flor has been working for eight years selling pupusas, and she already has a customer base and in this way she earns her daily living.

Flor needs the loan to purchase raw materials such as pork rinds, oil, flour, meat, and more to make the pupusas.

Flor wants to continue working selling pupusas and dreams of having a well-stocked store in the future and to help her children so that they go to school and are academically prepared.

loans.use: to purchase raw material such as pork rinds, oil, flour, meat, and more to make the pupusas.

loans.name: Paula Maricela

texts.es:
Paula de 37 años de edad, estudio hasta quinto grado,  es viuda y  tiene tres  hijos que se encuentran estudiando diferentes grados.


Paula tiene un  molino desde hace 13 años,  es una actividad que viene de familia, su abuela tenía el molino a cargo pero decidió dárselo a ella, además se dedica a vender leche y queso y ahora tiene en mente poner una tienda para mejorar sus ingresos.


Ella solicita este crédito para comprar jabón, detergentes, papel higiénico, arroz, frijol, etc. para su negocio. El préstamo mejorará su vida porque tendrá la oportunidad de vender más y podrá satisfacer algunas necesidades que tienen sus hijos. 

Sus sueños son que su negocio de resultados y que nunca le falte lo necesario para vivir a su familia.
texts.en:
Paula, 37 years old, went to school up to the fifth grade. She is a widow and has three children who are students in different grades.

Paula has had a mill for 13 years, this work comes from the family, her grandmother had a mill in her care, but she decided to leave it to her, in addition, she works selling milk and cheese and now she has in mind establishing a store to improve her income.

She asks for this loan to purchase soap, detergents, toilet paper, rice, beans, etc. for her business. The loan will improve her life because she will have the opportunity to sell more and will be able to satisfy some needs her children have.

Her dreams are that her business is successful and that her family never lacks what they need to live.

loans.use: to purchase soap, detergents, toilet paper, rice, beans, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Sonia Esmeralda

texts.es:
Sonia es una joven de 23 años de edad, estudió bachillerato sacando la opción secretariado, luego sacó un curso de cosmetología, está casada y su pareja se dedica a la reparación de celulares,  es así como aporta a la economía del hogar y tienen una niña de 4 años de edad, que todavía no asiste a la escuela.


Sonia se dedica a la venta de metales (enchape y acero), lo que son joyas que pueden usarla tanto hombres como mujeres, ya tiene 3 años de dedicarse a esta actividad, la cual le ha dado gran rentabilidad, ya tiene su propia clientela por lo que la venta se la hace más factible. El trabajo lo aprendió de una amiga que le enseñó la ruta de cómo era el negocio y luego ella tomó la decisión de emprenderlo, también se dedica a la venta de calzado, todo esto lo vende de casa en casa donde sus clientes, la distancia que recorre es de 3 km, el recorrido lo realiza a pie y el horario es de 8 am a 3 pm.   


El crédito lo necesita para comprar zapatos, ropa y joyas para continuar con su negocio.

Ella espera tener buenos resultados de su trabajo y salir adelante con su familia.
texts.en:
Sonia is a 23-year-old young woman, she completed secondary school in the secretarial track, then she completed a cosmetology course. She is married and her husband works repairing cell phones, and in this way he contributes to the household economy, and they have a 4-year-old daughter who doesn't go to school yet.

Sonia works selling metals (plated and steel), which is jewelry that both men and women can wear. She has been doing this work for 3 years now, which has given great profits, and she has her own customer base which makes her sales more practicable. She learned this work from a friend who showed her the path of how the business was, then she decided to undertake it. She also works selling shoes, all this she sells from house to house where her customers are. The distance she travels is 3 kilometers, she she travels it by foot and her schedule is from 8 am to 3 pm.

She needs the loan to purchase shoes, clothing and jewelry to continue with her business.

She hopes to have good results from her work and to get ahead with her family.

loans.use: to purchase shoes, clothing and jewelry to continue with her business.

loans.name: Reyna Margarita

texts.es:
Reyna tiene 37 años de edad, estudió bachillerato, luego empezó la universidad pero la abandonó al tener que realizar un viaje al extranjero, está casada y su esposo es comerciante, tiene una tienda de la que también genera ingresos al hogar, tiene dos hijos quienes viven con ella y estudian, en la casa también vive la mamá y unos hermanos de ella. 


Reyna tiene un comedor, por la mañana vende pupusas, panes con pollo y refrescos, tiene 5 meses de haber iniciado, la necesidades de generar ingresos la llevó a tomar esta iniciativa de trabajo. También al cerrar el comedor le apoya a su esposo con la tienda. El negocio lo tiene en su casa por lo que no recorre ninguna distancia.


Ella solicita este crédito para comprar ropa, trastos, bolsas para regalos entre otros para surtir la tienda de su esposo.


Ella espera crecer en las ventas y mejorar la economía de su hogar.
texts.en:
Reyna is 37 years old, completed secondary school, then started studying at the university but she dropped out to travel abroad. She is married and her husband is a salesman, he has a store from which he also generates household income, she has two children who live with her and go to school. Her mother and some of her siblings also live in the house.

Reyna has an eatery, in the morning she sells pupusas, breads with chicken and soft drinks. She began this 5 months ago, the need to generate income brought her to take this work initiative. After closing her eatery, she also supports her husband in the store. They have the business in their house, so she doesn't have to travel any distance.

She hopes to grow in sales and improve her household economy.

loans.use: to purchase clothing, containers, gift bags, and more to stock her husband's store.

loans.name: Shamshad

texts.en:
Shamshad is 48-years old woman. She lives in Lahore, Pakistan. She is a responsible mother of three children. Her husband is a rickshaw driver by profession. He has been running an auto rickshaw for the last six years from the past many days his rickshaw is not working properly because of regular uses. He feels that most of its parts are out of order. So he is unable to generate any amount of income.

He wants to buy a new auto rickshaw. However due to the lack of money he finds it difficult to cover the cost of new rickshaw. Therefore she has requested for a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan to help her husband to cover the cost of a new rickshaw. This will help him to continue his business. She is so much thankful to Kiva and brac Pakistan

loans.use: to buy a new auto rickshaw for her husband's transportation services

loans.name: Zeinab

texts.en:
Zeinab is a very talented tailor who specializes in dresses for weddings and special occasions. She has a remarkable reputation in her field and has 32 years of experience. A 51-year-old married mother of four children, Zeinab insists on supporting her beloved husband, who works as a taxi driver, in covering their family's increasing living expenses.

Zeinab is impressing her customers by making specially tailored costumes on request. She loves art work and she has proven herself to be skilful, so she is working hard to diversify the services she provides. Thus, she is applying for a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua, to buy a specialized machine to start a new artisan and special occasions design business.
She hopes to expand her business in the future through moving to a bigger place.

loans.use: to buy a specialized machine for a new design business

loans.name: Bertha Ines

texts.es:
Bertha es una mujer muy emprendedora y creativa, desde hace mucho tiempo ha querido ser independiente y tener su propio negocio de venta de calzado

Actualmente puede materializar su sueño gracias su gran capacidad de trabajo, al apoyo que recibe de la Corporación Interactuar y de las personas que deseen que ella salga adelante con su negocio.

De este negocio dependerán su esposo y sus 3 hijos a los cuales desea enseñarles del negocio y dejarles un legado.

Solicita un apoyo económico para comprar inventario de sandalias, ya que se acerca la temporada decembrina y es una muy buena oportunidad de poder iniciar este negocio.

Con un préstamo podrás a poyar a una madre llena de vida y empuje para su familia!
texts.en:
Bertha is a very creative and enterprising woman, who has wanted to become independent with her own footwear sales business for a long time.

She can now achieve her dream thanks to her great ability to work hard, and the support she receives from Interactuar and the people who wish her to progress with her business.

Her spouse and three children will depend on this business, and she hopes to teach her children about the business, and leave them an inheritance.

She is requesting financial help to buy a stock of sandals, as the holiday season is approaching, which is a very good opportunity to start up the business.

With a loan, you can support a woman who is full of life and drive for her family.

loans.use: to buy a stock of sandals.

loans.name: María Luisa

texts.es:
María, de 35 años de edad, está casada y tiene dos hijos junto a su esposo, es una persona honesta, responsable y trabajadora, se creció con su madre ayudándole en los quehaceres del hogar y anudándole en la venta que tenía para generar ingresos para los gastos de la familia, 

María, tiene una tiendita, con de donde obtiene ingresos que le ayudan con los gastos de la familia, este pequeño negocio lo tiene desde hace 6 años y le ha generado buenas ganancias.

María, necesita el préstamo para comprar más productos como arroz, azúcar, pan, café, detergentes, entre otros productos para surtir la tienda.

El sueño de María, es ampliar su tienda para que le genere más ingresos y poder ayudar a sus hijos en el estudio.
texts.en:
María, 35 years old, is married and has two children with her husband. She is an honest, responsible and hard-working person. She grew up with her mother, helping in the household chores and helping her with her sales which she had to generate income for the family expenses.

María has a small store, where she gets the income that helps with the family expenses. She has had this little business for 6 years and it has generated good earnings.

María needs the loan to purchase more products such as rice, sugar, bread, coffee, detergents, and other products to stock the store.

María's dream is to expand her store so that it generates more income and to be able to help her children in their schooling.

loans.use: to purchase more products such as rice, sugar, bread, coffee, detergents and other products for her store.

loans.name: Claribel Samara

texts.es: Hace tres años que Claribel se dedica a la venta de comida ambulante, está casada y tiene dos hijos pero solo uno tiene a su cargo. Su esposo es su principal apoyo, es una mujer emprendedora ya que poco a poco ha aumentado el tamaño de su negocio y generado buenas ganancias. Para seguir creciendo Claribel solicita un crédito para comprar mesas y granos básicos para la elaboración de la comida. Dentro de sus planes futuros desea remodelar su casa y construir un restaurante.
texts.en: For three years, Claribel has worked selling street food. She is married and has two children but only one is in her care. Her husband is her primary support, she is an enterprising woman since little by little she has increased the size of her business and has generated good earnings. To continue growing, Claribel asks for a loan to purchase tables and basic grains to make her food. Within her future plans, she wants to remodel her house and build a restaurant.

loans.use: to purchase tables and basic grains.

loans.name: Filomeno Casiano

texts.es: Filomeno es un hombre trabajador de 53 años que vive junto a su pareja y sus dos hijos en la localidad rural de Cabanaconde, que está ubicada en Arequipa. Él trabaja como obrero agrícola y también se dedica a la agricultura y a la cría de ganado vacuno orgánico, poniendo siempre mucha atención en el cuidado y en la alimentación que les brinda, que está constituida por alimento orgánico. Solicita el micro crédito para poder comprar alimento para su ganado vacuno y también destinará parte del crédito para la siembra de avena. En el futuro espera poder brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y seguir contando con buena salud, razón por la cual apuesta por lo orgánico.
texts.en: Filomeno is a hard-working man, 53 years old, who lives with his partner and their two children in the rural area of Cabanaconde, which is located in Arequipa. He works as a farm laborer and also works in agriculture and raising organic cows, always paying a lot of attention to their care and the feed he offers them, which is made up of organic feed. He asks for the microloan to be able to purchase the food for his cattle and also part of the loan will be used to plant oats. In the future, he hopes to be able to offer his family a better quality of life and continue having good health. For this reason, he bets on organics.

loans.use: to purchase forage to feed his organic cattle and to plant oats.

loans.name: Luis Eduardo

texts.es: Luis de 23 años es habitante de Barranquilla y reside en compañía de su cónyuge y su hijo en un barrio del municipio.  Él es un joven emprendedor que labora como promotor de ventas en una empresa de telefonía celular y su punto de ventas está en un centro comercial, allí comercializa celulares y planes de voz y datos, sin embargo recibía muchas solicitudes de parte de sus clientes quienes deseaban comprar accesorios para teléfonos entre ellos vidrios templados, fundas decorativas y protectoras, carcasas decorativas y demás.  Contando con esta gran demanda invirtió un pequeño capital e inició con esta actividad portando sus productos en una mochila que lleva a todas partes.  Esta labor ha permitido incrementar sus ingresos y ha beneficiado a su grupo familiar, sobre todo porque es padre de un bebe que requiere múltiples de cuidados para garantizar un óptimo crecimiento.  En la actualidad desea aprovisionarse de accesorios porque en este trimestre del año las ventas de equipos celulares y sus accesorios son muy prometedoras, en consideración solicitó un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, que invertirá en cargadores portátiles, carcasas, protectores de pantalla y demás. Su meta a futuro es tener un almacén con empleados y comprar su vivienda.
texts.en:
Luis, 23 years old, lives in Barranquilla and lives with his spouse and child in a neighborhood of the municipality. He is a young entrepreneur who works as a sales promoter in a cell phone business and his sales point is in a mall. There, he sells cellphones and voice and data plans, however he got many requests from his customers who want to purchase cellphone accessories, including tempered glass, decorative bags and protectors, decorative cases, and more. With this great demand, he invested a little capital and began with this work, carrying his products in a suitcase that he brings everywhere. This work has allowed him to increase his income and has benefited his family, above all because he is the father of a baby who needs a lot of care to guarantee optimal development.

Currently, he wants to provision himself with accessories because in this trimester of the year, the sales of cellphones and their accessories are very high, for which he asked for a Kiva loan, his first financing through Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, which he will invest in cellphone chargers, cases, screen protectors, and more. His goal for the future is to have a store with employees and to purchase his house.

loans.use: to invest in cellphone chargers, cases, screen protectors, and more.

loans.name: Yasmira

texts.es:
Yasmira es una joven de 21 años de edad, vive con su compañero sentimental.

Durante su vida productiva ha trabajado en diferentes restaurantes, pero un día tomó la decisión de iniciar su propio negocio y, como no posee el capital completo decide pedir ayuda.

Actualmente se encuentra muy ilusionada con este negocio de restaurante, está decidido a iniciar con este nuevo proyecto productivo, solicita el apoyo del crédito, con el que comprará utensilios de cocina, un carro de comidas rápidas y materia prima al por mayor (salsas, carnes, gaseosas, harina para arepas, huevos, aceite, papas, entre otros), así podrá poner en marcha su idea de negocio, del cual espera obtener buenos resultados, pues sueña con que la gente llegue, consuma sus productos y vuelva y, lograr ser reconocida en el sector, lo que le permitirá generar los recursos suficientes para dar a su familia lo que necesita.
texts.en:
Yasmira is a 21 year old young woman who lives with her partner.

Throughout her adult life she has worked in various restaurants, but one day decided to start her own business. As she does not quite have the capital she needs, she decided to ask for help.

She is now very excited about this restaurant business, and is dedicated to setting up a new productive project. She is requesting the help of a loan, with which she will buy cooking utensils, a fast food cart, and ingredients wholesale (including sauces, meats, sodas, flour for arepas, eggs, oil, and potatoes). With this, she will be able to get started with her business, with which she hopes to achieve good results.

She dreams of customers coming, consuming her products and then coming back again, making her well recognized in the area. This will allow her to generate the income necessary to give her family what they need.

loans.use: buy cooking utensils, a fast food cart, and ingredients wholesale (including sauces, meats, sodas, flour for arepas, eggs, oil, and potatoes).

loans.name: Mutinda

texts.en:
Mutinda is a 42-year-old married man and a father of three. He joined Hand in Hand Eastern Africa (HiH EA) in 2014 to benefit from their training courses, especially in enterprise development.

Mutinda practices mixed farming - i.e he farms both livestock (e.g. goats and poultry) and crops (e.g. maize, beans and vegetables). He is taking out a Kiva loan to buy animal feeds, vaccines
and certified seeds to boost his farming activities. This will increase his production and hence earn him more income to provide better food and education for his children.

Mutinda is grateful to Kiva and its lenders for this financial support.

loans.use: to buy animal feeds, vaccines and certified seeds to boost his farming activities.

loans.name: Evelin Elizabeth

texts.es:
Evelin  19   años d edad estudio hasta  noveno grado ya que por problemas económicos no ha podido seguir con sus estudios, actualmente esta soltera vive con sus padres y los ingreso que ella tiene es para el aporte de los gastos de la casa.

Evelin   es una joven que se dedica al trabajo en casa, ella les ayuda a los vecinos al lavar ropa es algo que ella hace por el momento ya que sus sueños es estudiar y obtener un mejor empleo. 

El préstamo solicitado lo necesita para comprar crema y queso para comercializar, ya que es un nuevo negocio que quiere emprender con su hermano.
 
Los sueños que ella tiene son que le vaya bien en el negocio, poder poner una tienda y seguir con los estudios para tener mejores oportunidades de empleo en la vida.
texts.en:
Evelin, 19 years old, went to school up to the ninth grade, and because of economic problems she has not been able to continue with her studies. Currently, she is single and lives with her parents and the income that she has is to contribute to the household expenses.

Evelin is a young woman who works at the household tasks. She helps the neighbors wash clothing, which is something she does for now since her dreams are to study and get a better job.

The requested loan is needed to purchase cream and cheese to sell, since that is a new business she wants to undertake with her brother.

The dreams she has are that her business goes well, to be able to establish a store and continue with her education to have better work opportunities in her life.

loans.use: to purchase cream and cheese to sell.

loans.name: Alejandro Fidel

texts.es:
Alejandro es un joven de 25 años de edad, vive con sus dos hijos y su esposa, trabaja en un taller de metales, pero el dueño le da la oportunidad de poder iniciar con un negocio independiente, por lo que él desea aprovechar esta oportunidad y montar su propio negocio de metalurgias, actividad que aprendió con la experiencia en este trabajo, así pretende generar los recursos necesarios para aportar a la economía de su hogar. 

Cuenta con la ventaja de que el local está bien ubicado y es reconocido en el sector. El cliente es un joven activo, dinámico, emprendedor y tiene muchas ganas de salir adelante, razón que lo impulsa a solicitar el apoyo del crédito para comprar acero y metal para tener una buena cantidad de materia prima, con esto podrá dar inicio a su proyecto productivo, del cual espera obtener buenos resultados para seguir avanzando hacia el cumplimiento de sus objetivos y más adelante poder generar oportunidades de empleo. 

Alejandro sabe que para lograr lo que sueña, debe trabajar arduamente, con empeño, disciplina y mucha dedicación, sólo de esta manera podrá disfrutar de una mejor calidad de vida y bienestar en compañía de su familia.
texts.en:
Alejandro is a 25-year-old young man and he lives with his two children and his wife. He works in a metal shop, but the owner is giving him the opportunity to be able to begin with an independent business, so he wants to take advantage of this opportunity and establish his own metallurgy business, work that he learned with the experience in this job. In this way, he plans to generate the necessary resources to contribute to the household economy.

He has the advantage that his retail space is well-situated and is known in the sector. The borrower is an active, dynamic and enterprising young man and has a lot of desire to get ahead, which is the reason that motivated him to ask for the support of a loan to purchase steel and metal to have a good quantity of raw materials. With this he will be able to begin his productive project, from which he hopes to get good results to continue advancing toward meeting his objective and in the future be able to generate employment opportunities.

Alejandro knows that to achieve his dreams, he should work hard, with determination, discipline and a lot of dedication, and only in this way he will be able to enjoy a better quality of life and well-being in the company of his family.

loans.use: to purchase a steel and metal to have good quantity of raw materials.

loans.name: Samuel Andres

texts.es: Samuel, a sus 25 años de edad, es un joven luchador y activo; con ganas de seguir adelante con su vida. Vive con sus padres y requiere generar ingresos para su sustento diario, por lo que desea iniciar su propio negocio de venta de mercancía, razón que la impulsa a solicitar el crédito que será invertido en la compra de surtido al por mayor (blusas, Jeans, zapatos, entre otros), y aprovechará los contactos que posee en otra ciudad para comercializar los artículos en distintas veredas de esa población; además de ofrecerlas en el sector donde reside a sus vecinos y familiares; de esta forma podrá generar los recursos económicos suficientes para apoyar económicamente en su hogar.
texts.en: Samuel, at 25 years old, is a determined and active young man with desire to get ahead in life. He lives with his parents and needs to generate income for his daily sustenance, so he wants to start his own business selling merchandise, the reason which motivated him to ask for the loan which will be invested in the purchase of an assortment in bulk (blouses, jeans, shoes, and more), and he will take advantage of the contacts he has in another city to sell these items in different parts of this population, in addition to selling them in the area where he lives, to his neighbors and family. In this way, he will be able to generate enough economic resources to support his household economically.

loans.use: to purchase an assortment in bulk (blouses, jeans, shoes, and more).

loans.name: Leticia Del Socorro

texts.es: Leticia poco a poco ha logrado salir adelante con su pulpería con el apoyo incondicional de su esposo. Leticia ya tuvo la oportunidad de trabajar con créditos que le han sido de mucha ayuda. Es por esta razón que solicita un crédito para comprar productos lácteos y carnes. Con este préstamo podrá realizar mejores ventas y obtener mayores ganancias.
texts.en: Leticia, little by little, has managed to get ahead with her store, with the unconditional support of her husband. Leticia has had the opportunity to work with loans before, which have been a lot of help for her. For this reason, she asks for a loan to purchase dairy products and meat. With this loan, she will be able to make better sales and get more earnings.

loans.use: to purchase dairy products and meat.

loans.name: Sara

texts.en:
Sara is a 25-year-old single woman from Lebanon living with her parents. Her brother is the main income earner in the family and works very hard to always be able to meet the family's needs and to live a good lifestyle. Sara is focusing on her studies at university.

Today, in order to pay her university fees, Sara is requesting a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l. She says that her goals are to achieve higher positions and be able to support her family members financially.

loans.use: to pay her university fees

loans.name: Marwa

texts.en:
Marwa is a 20-year-old single Lebanese woman. She lives with her parents and one sibling. Her father is the main income earner for the family. To help him, Marwa works as an employee in a company and in parallel she is still attending university. She is very kind and cares a lot about all of her family members.

Today, Marwa is eager to borrow a loan from Kiva partner Vitas. s.a.l. to pay her university fees. She says that she is very happy with the loan that will allow her to continue her education suitably.

loans.use: to pay her university fees.

loans.name: Silvia

texts.en:
Silvia is a 20-year-old single Lebanese woman living with her parents and four siblings. Her parents cooperate together in order to meet the family's daily needs and they are the main income earners. In addition to her studies, Silvia works in a company for extra money.

Today, with the aim of paying her technical study fees, Silvia is applying for a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l. In the future, she plans to take more Kiva loans to continue her education.

loans.use: to pay her technical study fees.

loans.name: Fredis Humberto

texts.es:
Fredis de 64 años de edad, sus estudios fueron de tercer grado de educación básica pero aun así cuando era joven se desempeñó como contador de una cooperativa agrícola, hoy está casado y es padre de ocho hijos de los cuales de solo 2 es tan estudiando.


Fredis se desempeña como agricultor, es lo que más ha hecho toda su vida, 
este trabajo lo aprendió porque es una persona muy emprendedora,  también así 
les ha enseñado a sus hijos y por eso son personas de bien. 

Fredis solicita este crédito para comprar fertilizantes para aplicar a sus cultivos y para comprar cerdos.

Él sueña con sembrar una platanera y aumentar su producción de granos básicos.
texts.en:
Fredis is 64 years old. He studied until the third grade of elementary school but even so as a young man he worked as an accountant in an agricultural cooperative. Today he is married and is the father of eight children of which only two are studying.

Fredis works as a farmer. It is what he has done all his life. He learned this work because he is a very enterprising person. He has also taught his children and because of this they have become good people.

Fredis is asking for this loan to buy fertilizer to apply to his crops and to buy pigs.

He dreams of planting banana trees and expanding his production of basic grains.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer to apply to his crops and to buy pigs

loans.name: José Carlos

texts.es:
José de 38  años d edad estudió hasta  bachillerato ya no pudo continuar con sus estudios por problemas de la economía, está acompañado y la esposa  se dedica a los oficios domésticos, en esta relación han procreado dos hijos los cuales los dos están estudiando 

José  es empleado de seguridad pública, trabajo que tiene desde hace 6 años, cuando él salió de sus estudios se vio en la obligación de conseguir un empleo y encontró  el trabajo, él tienen un turno de 72 horas y los demás días los dedica al trabajo de la agricultura.

El préstamo solicitado en Credicampo lo necesita para comprar fertilizantes para aplicar a sus cultivos de granos básicos.

 
José sueña con que Dios le dé vida y lo proteja en su trabajo para que pueda seguir luchando por sus hijos.
texts.en:
José, 38 years old, went to school through secondary and couldn't continue with his studies due to economic problems. He is partnered and his partner takes care of the domestic tasks. In this relationship, they have two children of whom both are studying.

José is employed in public security, work he has done for 6 years. When he left school, he saw the obligation to get a job and he found the work. He has a 72-hour shift and the other days he spends working in agriculture.

The requested loan from Credicampo is needed to purchase fertilizers to apply to his crops of basic grains.

José dreams that God will give him life and protect him in his work so that he can continue struggling for his children.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers to apply to his crops of basic grains.

loans.name: José Francisco

texts.es:
José de 35 años de edad, estudió hasta el segundo grado, ya que la familia no tenía los recursos para que él siguiera estudiando, está acompañado y la esposa se dedica a la elaboración de bordados para la comercialización, juntos tienen una hija la cual estudia, en la casa viven dos personas más pero solo la hija es la única que depende de ellos.


José se dedica al comercio de frutas y artesanías, tiene un local en donde vende las frutas y otro para vender artesanías, tiene cuatro años de tener el negocio y lo ha sabido administrar de buena manera, la necesidad de tener una fuente de ingresos lo llevó a  emprender este negocio, en las ventas lo apoya la esposa y la hija, los locales de venta los tiene frente a la casa y en el parque del pueblo, José trabaja los treinta días del mes sin descanso en horarios de 7 a.m a 6 p.m.

José invertirá los fondos del crédito para comprar frutas, artesanías y juguetes para continuar con su negocio.
Con esto el José podrá tener un mayor surtido de inventario para la venta y que los clientes puedan elegir entre una gran variedad de producto.

Sus sueños son mejorar los negocios y que la hija estudie en la universidad y esto lo logrará con las ganancias que generará con el trabajo.
texts.en:
José 35 years old, went to school to the second grade, since his family didn't have the resources for him to continue with his education. He is partnered and his partner works making embroidery to sell. Together, they have a daughter who goes to school. Two other people live in the house, but only the daughter depends on them.

José works selling fruit and crafts. He has a retail space where he sells the fruit, and another to sell crafts. He has had this business for four years, and he has known how to run them well. The need to have a source of income brought him to establish this business. With the sales, he supports his partner and daughter, the sales locations are in front of the house and in the town park. José works every day of the month without rest, at a schedule of 7 am to 6 pm.

José will invest the funds from the loan to purchase fruit, crafts, and toys to continue with his business.

With this, José will be able to have a greater assortment of inventory to sell, so his customers can also choose among a great variety of products.

His dreams are to improve his businesses and that his daughter studies at university and this he will achieve with the earnings that he will generate with his work.

loans.use: to purchase fruit, crafts and toys to continue with his business.

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es:
María, de 41 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y luchadora, estuvo acompañada y junto a él procrearon una niña, pero después decidieron separarse por problemas personales; hoy en día la niña tiene 6 años de edad y estudia primer grado.

María, se dedica a la venta de tortillas desde hace cinco años y es de este negocio de donde obtiene ganancias para poder pagar los gastos de su casa.

María, necesita el préstamo para comprar maíz para hacer tortillas y de esa manera seguir con su negocio.

María, sueña con seguir trabajando en su negocio de tortillas y colocar un negocio de pupusas.
texts.en:
María, 41 years old, is a hard-working and determined woman. She was partnered and with him, had a daughter, but later they decided to separate because of personal issues. These days, the girl is 6 years old and is in first grade.

María has worked selling tortillas for five years and with this business she gets earnings to be able to pay the household expenses.

María needs the loan to purchase corn to make tortillas and in this way continue with her business.

María dreams of continuing to work in her tortilla business and establishing a pupusa business.

loans.use: to purchase corn to make tortillas, and in this way continue with her business.

loans.name: Usaini

texts.en:
Usaini is a Babban Gona farmer. He is excited that Babban Gona offers a lasting solution to ending the cycle of poverty, renewing his dreams of gaining wealth someday. Normally, Usaini would have had to sell his maize at harvest time, when maize prices are at their lowest in the market, to meet his immediate cash needs. With this loan, he can store his maize at harvest time and sell it at a future date for up to 37% higher prices. Benefiting from Babban Gona’s marketing support, Usaini has the opportunity to generate earnings of up to $2,000.

Usaini is thankful that he no longer has to worry about having too little money to increase his farmland and he looks forward to using his additional earnings to provide employment to members of his community through his farm.

loans.use: to buy food and clothing, eliminating pressure to sell maize for low prices at harvest time.

loans.name: Behemoth School

texts.en:
Greetings from Uganda! This is Solomon. He is an administrator at Behemoth School of Nursing & Midwifery, a mixed school in the rural area of Kayunga in Mukono with 43 students.

Behemoth School has requested a loan to cover the cost of installing and maintaining a UV water filtration system to provide clean drinking water for its students. The school does not currently have access to consistent clean drinking water and therefore has to spend a considerable portion of its budget on firewood, which is used to boil water. Installing a water filtration system will therefore save the school money in the long-term as the cost of firewood will be reduced. The loan will enable the school to purchase a UV water treatment system with a 450 liter tank, which will be big enough to store clean drinking water for the students every day.

Behemoth School will repay the loan from school fees, which are collected each term. Solomon ultimately hopes that having access to safe drinking water will improve his students' concentration and attendance by reducing the number of children who fall sick from water-borne diseases, as well as increasing the number of students coming to the school.

loans.use: To purchase a water filtration system to provide clean drinking water for its students.

loans.name: Allahverdiyev

texts.en:
Allahverdi is 18 years old. He is a very young and passionate person. Allahverdi is an internally-displaced person from Bilasuvar refugee settlement. He lives with his family and takes cares of his parents and also his younger siblings. At this young age, he knows that he has great responsibilities. He is a farmer and he grows wheat. He is very diligent because he knows that success requires dedication. Allahverdi likes to provide more natural products to people. Being a refugee and from the region where people are more familiar with farming gives him an advantage in the local market. He is more familiar with local area people and knows the peoples' needs and demands.

In Azerbaijan, people consume a lot of wheat. Rural people bake their own bread and make pastries and cakes at home. Allahverdi has an advantage because people know him as an honest person who sells natural wheat. Currently he is planning to buy more fertilizers and for this he needs 1,200 AZN. Hopefully Kiva lenders will support him.

loans.use: to buy more fertilizers for his wheat.

loans.name: Jose Hernan

texts.es:
El señor José de 43 años de edad, tiene casa propia vive en  San Lorenzo,  se dedica desde hace 11  años al negocio de trasporte de materiales de construcción, también se dedica a la compra y venta de vehículos usados, es un hombre trabajador con muchos deseos de seguir adelante.
 
El señor José está solicitando el préstamo para compra de llantas para su volqueta. Con el apoyo del crédito él pretende tener mejor  su vehículo de trabajo, está muy contento con  el apoyo que prisma le puede brindar.

Su sueño es mejorar su casa y su volqueta.


San Lorenzo, honduras - Octubre del 2015.
texts.en:
José, 43 years old, has his own house and lives in San Lorenzo. He has worked for 11 years at his business hauling construction materials. He also works buying and selling used vehicles. He is a hard-working man with a lot of desire to get ahead.

José is asking for the loan to purchase tires for his dump truck. With the support of the loan, he plans to have his work vehicle improved, he is very happy with the support that Prisma can offer him.

His dream is to improve his house and his dump truck.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - October 2015.

loans.use: to purchase tires for his dump truck.

loans.name: Myriam Elena

texts.es:
Myriam, con 48 años de edad, es casada. Durante su vida productiva se ha dedicado a laborar como empleado de oficios varios en fincas de diferentes veredas del corregimiento. 

Desde hace unos meses cuenta con experiencia en la cría y comercialización de pollos y, debido a ello, desea iniciar su propio negocio para generar ingresos adicionales para su familia. 

Cuenta con la ventaja de tener un terreno para sostenerlos y por esto se anima a solicitar el crédito, que será invertido en la compra de pollos, materiales para construcción de galpón y compra de alimento para los mismos, de esta manera tendrá la posibilidad de producir unos ejemplares de buena calidad obteniendo así un negocio rentable.

Myriam es una mujer pujante, activa, trabajadora y se esmera por sacar adelante su familia; ella sueña poder mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda
texts.en:
Myriam, 48 years old, is married. During her work life, she has worked as an employee in various tasks on farms in different parts of town.

For some months, she has had experience in raising and selling chickens and, due to this, she wants to begin her own business to generate additional income for her family.

She has the advantage of having land to sustain them and for this she is excited to ask for the loan, which will be invested in the purchase of chickens, materials to build the chicken coop and to purchase feed for them. In this way, she will have the possibility of producing some good quality products, getting a profitable business in this way.

Myriam is a strong woman, active and hard-working and she strives to get her family ahead. She dreams of being able to improve the condition of her house.

loans.use: to purchase chickens, materials to build the chicken coop, and to purchase feed for them.

loans.name: Miguel Ángel

texts.es:
Miguel es un joven de 26 años de edad, sacó su bachillerato con la opción contador, por razones económicas no logró continuar la universidad por lo que se dedicó a trabajar, está casado y su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos, tienen una niña de 4 años de edad y nadie más depende de Miguel.


Miguel quiere iniciar un negocio familiar el cual sería la venta de ropa, negocio que manejaría su esposa ya que él por su empleo no tendría el tiempo necesario para poder dedicarse al nuevo negocio, de esta forma podrán tener mejores condiciones de vida y podrán ayudarse mutuamente.


El crédito lo necesita para comprar zapatos, camisetas, blusas, faldas, vestidos, ropa interior, etc. Para echar a andar su nuevo plan de negocio.

Él espera que su negocio funcione para aumentar sus ingresos y tener mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Miguel is a young man who is 26 years old. He took a higher secondary-education course in accounting but for financial reasons could not continue university so he decided to work. He is married and his wife dedicates herself to the household chores. They have a daughter of 4 years of age and nobody else depends on Miguel.

Miguel wants to start a family business which would be selling clothing. The business would be managed by his wife as he would not have the necessary time to dedicate himself to the new business because of his job. This way they can have better living conditions and help one another.

He needs the loan to buy shoes, shirts, blouses, skirts, dresses, underwear, etc, to set his new business plan on its way.

He hopes that his business works as a way of increasing their income and to have better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy shoes, shirts, blouses, skirt, dresses, underwear, etc. in order to initiate his new business plan

loans.name: Luis Enrique

texts.en:
Luis Enrique is a 25-year-old man. He is happily married and blessed with two young daughters. He enjoys spending time with his family, and he is always looking for extra time to share with them. Luis Enrique describes himself as a very dedicated person, who is self-sufficient, honest, and respectful.

In order to earn a living, Luis Enrique works for a petrol company and drives a truck to transport petrol. His job consumes most of his time because he has to drive the truck all around the country. Luis Enrique was struck by a great idea while he was traveling - he thought of buying merchandise around the country to resell when he is at home.

Luis Enrique is certain that this project will allow him to attain a higher quality of life and will provide a brighter future for his daughters. To accomplish this goal, Luis Enrique is applying for a Kiva loan of 7,000 MXN through Kubo.financiero, a Mexican field partner.

loans.use: to buy products around the country for resale.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en:
Virginia is a 56 year old woman, she is currently married to a loving husband and has 5 sons, none of them live with her or her husband, they are now grown adults with a college degree. Raising her kids into grown men is among Virginia's biggest achievements, she couldn't be more proud about that.

Virginia enjoys spending her free time with her husband, likes to take a walk along him. She also enjoys working; she makes a living by running a restaurant outside her house. She is also very proud of it because it has been growing for the last 15 years; she started with a small stand, but now she has got 22 tables.

Virginia is applying for a 15,000.00 MXN loan; with it she will be looking to by sodas and other foodstuffs; and to make some improvements to her business, like fixing the ceiling and buying extra chairs.

loans.use: to get enhance her restaurant.

loans.name: Parviz

texts.en:
Parviz is a 31 year old man. He is refugee who lives in Bilasuvar, which is in the southern part of Azerbaijan and has a large internally-displaced persons settlement. Parviz lives with his family in a small community of refugees, in one of the largest refugee provinces of Azerbaijan. This is a zone that is number one in the national production of fruits and vegetables. It also produces staple grains (rice, beans, corn), as well as root vegetables and garden vegetables.

For a few months now, Parviz has needed some financing to buy seeds and cultivate suitable land for these types of products. With this business activity, he will be able to earn more and improve his quality of life. For this reason, Parviz is requesting a loan of 1,200 AZN. He wants to buy seeds to grow fruits and fertilizers to obtain a good harvest. Parviz is a member of a farmers club in Bilasuvar and this loan will help him to improve his living conditions. Kiva lenders should support him.

loans.use: to buy seeds to grow fruits and fertilizers to obtain a good harvest, which will help him improve his living conditions.

loans.name: Sebuhi

texts.en:
Sabuhi is a 31 year old man. He is an internally displaced person (IDP) and lives in a refugee settlement with his family. He is a farmer and grows vegetables and fruits. He is an energetic and passionate man. He likes this activity, because he does this daily activity together with his parents. He has been a farmer more than 10 years.

Sabuhi is an intelligent man. He learns daily about agricultural activities and searches on internet about the farming techniques. He takes the fresh fruits and vegetables to market. People like to purchase the goods from him, due to his honesty and trustworthy nature. Sabuhi supplies the fresh and natural products. Nowadays the markets are full of non-healthy fruits and other vegetables. People like to buy the healthy goods because they have become health-conscious.

He sees the growth in demand. So he is also planning to expand. He needs 1200 AZN loan. He will use this loan to buy new fruit trees and fertilizers. Kiva lenders should support him.

loans.use: to buy new fruit trees and fertilizers.

loans.name: Ceyhun

texts.en:
Ceyhun is 22 years old and single. He is an internally displaced person (IDP) and lives in Bilasuvar refugee settlement with his family. His parents are retired. Ceyhun is a farmer. He raises 4 cows and 6 sheep. He keeps them in his yard. He loves this job. He is a very passionate and honest man. People like to do business with him due to his nature. His frankness and honesty brings more clients to him. Clients appreciate his business, because he supplies fresh, natural and very healthy meat.

In Azerbaijan most of the families consume more than 10 -15 kgs meat per month. These numbers are increasing, due to the variety of traditional dishes being made with meat. Ceyhun wants to expand the business. He wants to get married and also improve his living conditions. He requires 1200 AZN. He will buy 3 calves; he wants to fatten them and sell their meat. He will also use the milk for the family. Kiva lenders should support Ceyhun.

loans.use: to buy three calves to enhance his business.

loans.name: Sayyaf

texts.en:
Sayyaf was born in 1990. He is refugee living in Bilasuvar refugee settlement. He lives with his family in a village.

Sayyaf has been busy with animal husbandry for more than three years. He mainly feeds sheep and goats. He has great experience in this field because his parents have been doing this work for years and he has been both helping them and observing. In this way, he has gained vast knowledge and experience. Sayyaf's brother and sister help him with feeding the animals. He buys little sheep and goats, feeds them for some months, and then sells in a local market. He lives near the local bazaar, so he brings the meat to the local market and meets the great demand for meat.

Currently Sayyaf is planning to buy ten sheep. He needs 1,200 AZN. Kiva lenders should support him.

loans.use: to buy ten sheep to raise.

loans.name: José Salomón

texts.es:
José de 43 años de edad, tiene sexto grado de educación básica, está acompañado y su pareja es comerciante, tiene tres hijos que están estudiando y dependen de José.


José se dedica  a la agricultura, hace  esta labor desde que era muy joven, un tío le  enseñó la actividad, decidió dedicarse a esto ya que no encontró otra forma de ayudar a su familia. Otra actividad económica que él tiene es de  seguridad en una empresa (vigilante) pero es temporal dos o tres veces a la semana, pero la actividad que más hace es la agricultura y la ganadería, él compra ganado para aprovechar los residuos de la cosecha agrícola, y su horario de trabajo es de 5 a 6 horas diarias.  


Él necesita mucho de este crédito para comprar dos bueyes para surcar la tierra donde sembrará.

Su sueño es que sus hijos logren estudiar una carrera universitaria para tener más oportunidades en la vida, sueña con llegar a tener un negocio de venta de queso y va a trabajar para lograr sus metas.
texts.en:
José, 43 years old, has a sixth grade education, he is partnered and his partner is in sales. He has three children who are studying and depend on José.

José works in agriculture. He has done this work since he was very young. An uncle showed him the work, and he decided to work in it since he didn't find another way to help his family. Another job he has is in security for a business (security guard) but it is casual, two or three times a week, but the work that he does most is agriculture and raising animals. He purchases cows to take advantage of the remains of the farm harvest and his work schedule is 5 to 6 hours daily.

He needs this loan a lot to purchase two oxen to plow the land where he will plant.

His dream is that his children manage to study for a university degree to have more opportunities in life. He dreams of having a business selling cheese and he will work to achieve his goals.

loans.use: to purchase two oxen to plow the land where he will plant.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan es un hombre de campo y padre de 3 hijos por los que ha tenido que pasar por muchas adversidades en su vida, sin embargo siempre ha tenido la fortaleza para salir adelante y continuar progresando con su familia.
Desde hace tiempo ha querido montar un negocio de cría y venta de pollos.

Es por eso que solicita un gran aliento económico para comprar algunos pollos para cría y materiales para la construcción de un galpón.

Con este nuevo negocio podrá generar ingresos para su familia que es todo para él y podrá mejorar la calidad de vida de su esposa y sus hijos.

Trabajara todos los días para impulsar su negocio y hacerlo una actividad sostenible y rentable.

Apoya a un hombre trabajador con un préstamo!
texts.en:
Juan is a man of the countryside and father of 3 children for whom he has had to go through many adversities in his life. However, he has always had the strength to get ahead and continue progressing with his family.

For some time, he has wanted to establish a business raising and selling chickens.

For this, he asks for a big economic support to purchase some chicks to raise and materials to build the chicken coop.

With this new business, he will be able to generate income for his family, which is everything for him, and he will be able to improve the quality of life for his wife and children.

He will work every day to boost his business and make it a sustainable and profitable business.

Support this hard-working man with a loan!

loans.use: to purchase some chicks to raise and materials to build the chicken coop.

loans.name: Elmaddin

texts.en:
Elmaddin is 31 years old. He lives in the Bilasuvar internally displaced person (IDP) settlement. Six years ago, Elmaddin started farming on a small, inherited piece of land in his own garden in Bilasuvar, south part of Azerbaijan. Today, this humble person who has a small family and a son sells milk, eggs, maize, and a variety of food crops. He also raises the cow and uses its milk for house purposes.

He is a passionate farmer and, because of his immense knowledge of farming, he commands a lot of respect from other farmers in his village. Dairy farming is close to his heart, and every day he wakes up to milk his cow, and that makes him very proud. Although he makes profits through milk selling, he lacks a proper dairy unit, and he is seeking a loan to build one. Through the loan, he will have a humble time milking and feeding his cow. A good dairy unit provides a sheltered place where cows can relax, and it also helps to protect them from diseases that may arise if they are exposed to harsh weather conditions such as rain and sun. Elmaddin needs 1200AZN loan for this purpose. He is looking forward to the kindness of Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to build a dairy unit for his cows.

loans.name: Ravan

texts.en:
Ravan is a 26-year-old refugee from Bilasuvar IDP settlement. He is a highly motivated farmer who's been able to get his business idea ahead through effort and dedication. He is taking care of his family, He helps his old parents who are retirees. Sometimes his parents come and support Ravan in the yard for farming activities.

For the last six years, and with the goal of generating more income, he has been doing farming activities like growing vegetables and fruits. He is a very diligent and honest man. People know him as a trustworthy person. He sells vegetables and fruite in a local bazaar and to clients in the neighbourhood. Ravan displays his products in a shop located in the bazaar close to his home.

He is now applying for 1200 AZN for expanding his business activity. With the growing demand for fruits and vegetables, he needs to expand as well. He will uses the funds to buy fertilizers and new fruit trees.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and new fruit trees.

loans.name: Mirllan

texts.es:
Mirllan una persona emprendedora desde siempre, quien ha emprendido varios negocios con el fin de encontrar una sostenibilidad económica y sobre todo poder dedicar su tiempo a sus 4 hijos, está incursionando en el mundo de la belleza con sus servicios de cepillado, maquillaje, arreglo de uñas, etc. 
Con el cual ha generado ingresos para sostener su hogar.

Espera crecer mucho más su negocio, en un futuro posicionarse en el mercado de un forma segura.
Su dificultad más grande es la competencia.
El crédito será utilizado para adquirir productos de belleza (maquillaje, plancha, sprays, cremas de peinar, etc.) y una vitrina para exhibirlos con los que podrá ofrecer un servicio de mejor calidad.
texts.en:
Mirllan has always been an enterprising person who has undertaken various businesses with the end of finding economic sustainability and, above all, to be able to dedicate her time to her 4 children. She is making inroads in the world of beauty with her services of styling, makeup, doing nails, etc., with which she has generated income to sustain her household.

She hopes to grow her business a lot more, in the future to establish herself securely in the market.

Her greatest difficulty is the competition.

The loan will be used to get beauty products (makeup, flat iron, sprays, styling cream, etc.) and a display case to show them, with which she will be able to offer higher quality service.

loans.use: to get beauty products (makeup, flat iron, sprays, styling cream, etc.) and a display case to show them, with which she will be able to offer a better quality service.

loans.name: Yesika Yamileth

texts.es:
Yesika es una joven de 28 años de edad, madre soltera de tres hijos de las edades de 5 y 10 años; estudió hasta sexto grado ya que por problemas económicos no pudo continuar con los estudios .

Yesika se dedica a actividades comerciales, específicamente a la venta de frutas de temporada (aguacate, mango, jocotes, etc.) actividad que aprendió de su madre, las frutas las adquiere en los alrededores de su residencia y luego va a vender al mercado de la ciudad. Así mismo, se dedica a vender cosas de la canasta básica en su casa ya que va iniciando una pequeña tienda.

 El presente préstamo lo necesita para comprar frutas como jocotes y bananos para continuar con su negocio.
 
Para un futuro ella desea tener muy surtida su tienda para mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Yesika is a 28 year old woman, who is a single mother of three children ages 5 to 10.  She studied until sixth grade, but could not continue due to financial problems.

Yesika works in sales, specifically selling seasonal fruits (avocado, mango, jocotes, etc.), a trade she learned from her mother.  She requires the fruits around her home and then sells them at the city market.  She also works selling basic goods from her home, since she has started a small store.

She needs this current loan in order to purchase fruits like jocotes and bananas to continue her business.
 
In the future, she wishes to have her store well-stocked and improve the living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase fruits like jocotes and bananas to continue her business.

loans.name: Blanca Esperanza

texts.es:
Blanca, de 44 años de edad, es una persona honesta y trabajadora, tiene una tienda, se dedica al comercio desde muy pequeña, porque su madre tiene una tienda desde hace 35 años y eso la motivo a colocar su propio negocio y a luchar por sacar adelante a su hijo y así mejorar sus ingresos económicos.

Blanca, todos los días se levanta muy temprano para atender a sus clientes, porque su negocio lo abre a las 5:00 de la mañana y cierra a las 9:00 de la noche; ella vende productos de uso persona y de limpieza para el hogar. 

Blanca, necesita el préstamo para surtir más su negocio, porque la demanda que tiene de productos es muy grande.

Blanca, sueña con poder ampliar más su negocio y así tener mejores ingresos para seguir mandando a su hijo a la escuela.
texts.en:
Blanca is 44 years old. She is an honest and hardworking person. She has a store. She has dedicated herself to business since she was very young. Her mother has had a store for 35 years and that was the motive for starting her own business in order to fight to bring up her son and improve their income.

Blanca gets up very early every day to take care of her customers. Her business opens at 5:00 in the morning and closes at 9:00 in the evening. She sells personal use items and household cleaning products.

Blanca needs a loan to better supply her business because the demand that she has for products is very high.

Blanca dreams of being able to expand her business and thus having better income in order to continue sending her child to school.

loans.use: to better supply her store because the demand for products is high

loans.name: Tibori Zoobu - Samang Yapala Group

texts.en:
Faiza is the woman squatting while measuring beans into a basin in the photo. She is a 30-year-old married woman with three children. Faiza lives in Samang-Yapala, a suburb of Karaga in Northern Ghana. She trades in food stuffs at the local market and has two people assisting in her business.

Faiza is a member of a group of business-minded women called "Tibori Zoobu-Samang Yapala" (We Need Progress Group of Samang Yapala) in Karaga. She and the group face the challenge of having inadequate capital. They have therefore applied to Grameen Ghana for a loan of GHC 8,800. Faiza’s share of the loan is GHC 500, which she will use to buy food stuffs (maize, peanuts, millet, beans, etc.) for resale at her home market.

Faiza aspires to create a central market where customers will be served with all kinds of food items they need. She wants to earn a good income from her sales to pay off this loan and leave some money to meet her children’s basic educational needs. Faiza is very happy with her Kiva relationship and thanks lenders for it.

loans.use: to buy food stuffs (maize, peanuts, millet, beans, etc.) for resale at her home market.

loans.name: Maria Del Socorro

texts.es:
Maria es una madre muy responsable de 3 hijos, ha tenido que pasar por muchas adversidades en su vida, sin embargo siempre ha tenido la fortaleza para salir adelante y continuar progresando con su familia. 

Hace un tiempo montó su venta de huevos, para lo cual tiene una cantidad de gallinas que le permiten tener ciertas ventas. 

Sueña con ver su negocio crecer y sabe que con la ayuda de la Corporación Interactuar y de las personas que apoyen su oficio podrá lograrlo.

Es por esto que busca un préstamo que le permita comprar más gallinas para poder incrementar su capacidad de producción de huevos y así responder a la demanda de sus clientes por los huevos.

De esta manera sus ventas se incrementarán considerablemente, además de que su negocio resurgirá y podrá salir adelante. 

Maria también desea tener un gran negocio donde pueda utilizar toda la capacidad que pueda para sacarlo adelante y así ofrecerles a sus hijos un futuro económico estable.
texts.en:
Maria is a very responsible mother of three children. She has had to endure many hardships in her life, but nevertheless has always had the strength to move forward and continue making strides with her family.

Some time ago she started selling eggs and so she has a quantity of chickens that allow her to have a certain number of sales.

She dreams of seeing her business grow and knows that with the help of Interactuar and from the people that support her work she can do it.

She is seeking a loan that will permit her to buy more chickens in order to increase the capacity of egg production and so respond to customer demand for eggs.

Her sales will increase considerably. In addition, her business will exhilarate and she can move ahead.

Maria also wants to have a big business so she can utilize all her talent so she can get ahead and offer her children a future of financial stability.

loans.use: to buy more chickens in order to increase her capacity of egg production

loans.name: Shamil

texts.en:
Shamil is 32 years old. He is a refugee. Shamil is living in a refugee settlement called Bilasuvar in the southern part of the country. He resides with his family, that is, his father and mother. Shamil has a college education and uses this knowledge in his daily farming activities. He has studied agricultural subjects.

To provide a good income for his family, he is involved in agriculture. Shamil started his business eight years ago and has good experience in it. He has 6 cows and 14 sheep. He raises calves, fattens them, and then takes their meat to the local bazaar. He keeps these animals on his own land. There is a big demand for meat in Azerbaijan. People consume a lot of meat. Most of the traditional dishes like kebabs, kufta and rice consist of meat.

Shamil has requested a loan in the amount of 1,200 AZN to buy sheep to fatten up and resell. Shamil intends to channel his earnings toward developing his business and improving his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy sheep to fatten up and resell.

loans.name: Luz Janeth

texts.es:
Luz, es una mujer de 40 años de edad que desde hace algún tiempo se ha dedicado a diversas actividades laborales pero siempre con un deseo en su mente que era el incursionar en el área comercial, fue así como desde inicios del año 2014, monto su negocio de venta de productos de la marca Amway

Luz se caracteriza por ser una mujer emprendedora, amable, con visión y muchas ganas de salir adelante, es por esta razón que se anima a solicitar un crédito, para invertirlo en la compra de productos de uso personal, con el fin de darle una mejor imagen al negocio, que logre atraer más clientes y así ofrecerles una variedad de productos que satisfagan las necesidades y gustos de todos los clientes. 

De esta manera logrará obtener ingresos para continuar aportando a la economía de su hogar y ahorrar para montar varias sucursales de su negocio y así tendrá un futuro más próspero, donde podrá mejorar notoriamente su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Luz, age 40, has devoted herself to various work activities for some time. However, she has always kept in mind her desire to enter the commercial area. That is how she set up her business of selling Amway products in the start of the year 2014. Luz is known for being an enterprising and kind woman with vision and a great desire to get ahead.

That is the reason she is encouraged to request a loan to buy personal use products in order to give her business a better image. This will manage to attract more customers. This way she will offer them a variety of products that will satisfy the needs and preferences of all of her customers. This way she will manage to get income to continue contributing to the household finances. She will also save to set up several branches of her business. This way she will have a more prosperous future where she will be able to notably improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy personal use products in order to give her busines a better image.

loans.name: Aynur

texts.en:
Aynur is 27 years old. Aynur is a refugee living in a refugee settlement, which was built for the people who lost their homes due to the war. She is living with her family, which consists of her father, mother and two sisters.

Aynur is a farmer. She has been doing this for nine years. She raises cows and sheep. She has also seen her parents doing this activity from her childhood. So she has gained very good experience. She knows the details of her job. That is helping her. But the most important factor in her being a successful young farmer is her passion and joy. She loves her job, and she likes to take good care of her animals. She raises them for meat purposes. She also uses their milk for personal use. Aynur usually fattens them and then sells their meat at the local bazaar. People like to buy from Aynur, because she is trustworthy and brings very good fresh, natural meat to the market. Also there is increasing demand. Azerbaijani people consume meat a lot.

To meet the demand, she is planning to expand. Aynur wants to buy three calves. She requires 1,800 AZN. She hopes that Kiva lenders will support her.

loans.use: to buy three calves.

loans.name: Parishan

texts.en:
Parishan is a 25-year-old internally displaced person from Bilasuvar region. She is single and lives with her family in a refugee settlement. Her family consists of old parents and three siblings. Her father and mother are retired persons.

She grows fruits and vegetables. She loves her job because it is in her yard and she loves to see the crop and harvests. She grows very healthy natural fruits and vegetables and takes them to the local bazaar for selling. People appreciate Parishan's hard work because she is very diligent, honest and kind towards her clients. Parishan is a very intelligent lady. The natural fruits and vegetables sold to the customers are mainly used in traditional dishes and desserts.

She is planning to expand the business. She needs to buy some fertilizer and new fruit trees. She needs 1,800 AZN. Kiva lenders should support her.

loans.use: to buy some fertilizer and new fruit trees
